long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension allows you to compare your files directly in Chrome. Just click on toolbar icon. Also you will get sha256 hash of files.

Your can check file hash on viruses or find native file name with 'Virus Total' service.

"Same file or not? Check with Files Comparison"

v1.0.1
- Manifest v3
- Now you can drop files in the special area
- File size info added 

v0.0.3:
- Deleted permission "notifications"
